评论概述: Amazing for weight lifting, VERY comfortable.
评论详情: I bought these back in 2022 and I was considering purchasing another pair. ONLY issue the the Velcro that attaches to the laces is starting to fall apart, mind you I’ve been using these shoes for workouts nearly 4-5 days a week for over 2 years. LOVE them for squatting/deadlifting, walking on the treadmill and overall the are very comfortable to walk in.  I recommend these wide toe shoes for people who don’t even have wide feet. It’s healthier for your feet to have minimal restrictions. These shoes have the perfect amount of padding, extremely minimal yet very comfortable. Can’t recommend these enough for weight lifting. I’ll be purchasing another pair soon.

评论概述: Excellent zero lift shoe for running & training.

This is my husbands favorite pair of shoes says they are super comfortable had me get another pair in black and red.

This is the reason for a 1 star review. My girlfriend got these shoes and loves them. So, I wanted to try them. I ordered my typical shoe size directly from Oranginer's website. When I received them they were just a bit small, so I needed to exchange them for the next size up. I contacted Oranginer as directed on their website. I received no indication that they got my email, so 3 days later, I sent another email just as instructed on their website. I never heard back from them. They have a chat on the website, so I submitted my request via the chat...I got nothing back from the chat for 5 days. I gave up trying to deal with the company and came here on Amazon to order the next size up for me. This way, if they don't fit, at least Amazon will be responsive.

评论概述: Perfect for working out in home gym
评论详情: Great for lifting weights and using rowing machine and elliptical in home gym.

Out of the box I had to loosen the laces quite a bit and still had difficulty getting the shoes on. Once they were on though, the shoes felt good.  My first experience with 'barefoot' shoes and found that running felt better and doing brisk walk was much easier. I've always found fast walking very difficult but it was not an issue with these shoes.

I purchased these to replace my 20 yr old New Balance MT trail. NB has gotten way out of hand when it comes to their minimus line of shoes. They all have moon shoe soles on them that don't belong on a barefoot shoes.  I trail ran in these for the first time today. The construction on these is just as good as the NB. Toe box is nice and wide. The toe protector comes up over the top of the shoe. On the NBs these started to separate at that spot. These shoes are heavier than the NB. They have padding on the inside near the mouth of the shoe. NBs don't have any which Isn't necessarily a bad thing. The sole is also thicker but doesn't hinder the barefoot feel too much. My only "big" gripe is that the tounge should be sewn in place. I found them to flop to once side or the other.  They seem to be a pretty decent shoe considering they are a third of the price of the NBs. Time will tell how well they hold up.
Comfortable Easy on and off So far durable Go larger

I have had these shoes for five months, and the thin material has already developed a hole in them. Like I said, great, very comfortable shoes, but don't expect them to last very long. I will not waste my money on another pair.

Pick your color carefully! I looked at the pictures of the lighter colored shoes to see the finer details of the mesh pattern on the shoes, and ultimately picked the black pair.  Upon delivery, I found that the black pair is actually a water shoe. They do not have the breather holes in the upper...just solid neoprene type material like you'd see on a water shoe.  I didn't want to go through the whole return process, and I needed to get to the gym.  Surprisingly, my feet weren't a sopping mess by the time I was done! Even after I rode the motorcycle to the gym in the Florida heat. Very surprising. I'm sure the nice cotton socks had a lot to do with that, though.  Super comfortable shoes. Ran a mile on the treadmill after my workout, and no discomfort there. My feet definitely felt the run in a different way, though. Sorta feels like my feet got a bit of a workout as well, which is what I was after with this type of shoe.  We'll see how they hold up. Next time, I'd definitely get one of the other pairs with the breather holes. Also, the black pair doesn't have the quick tie system. FYI

I think they still need worn in a bit more but they are super comfortable.  I have worn them with and without socks and it makes no difference in the feel. Traction is great and i love the style of them!

评论概述: Not all varieties are the same.
评论详情: I had a pair of these that I walked through after a year or so. I bought this one and it came with more padding and laces. My previous pair, of the same brand, were slip on with almost no padding and the little elastic “laces.”  The new pair may be comfortable but the extra padding makes them too tight so I should’ve gotten a half size up and I didn’t want to mess with laces. LOOK CAREFULLY at the pics before you purchase so you know which you’re getting. There should be a note indicating the differences but there isn’t. Just look at the pics for each shoe.

Llegaron bien, y rapido, los zapatos se sienten bastante comodos

All of the great benefits of barefoot movement with enough protection from sharp stones. I have been searching for the perfect zero drop hiking shoe for summer. As a heavier hiker I need a thicker sole to protect my feet from being bruised by stones. I also have an ankle instability on one side which can cause my foot to supinate heavily and soft soled shoes amplify this making walking painful over time and dangerous on uneven ground. Most barefoot style shoes have very thin soles with loads of ground feel, great for the instability but really not a good idea for a heavy person as we do need a bit more cushion and shock absorption on hard ground. So I was pretty happy to find these. They feel great. Fit is snug but comfortable. I can walk comfortably over large gravel and other surfaces.I have taken them out on a few walks now and in water and out, dirt trails, steep rocky slopes and they performed so well. No slipping and moving on my feet even when wet. Good traction on steep terrain. Fit is true to size. I prefer men's shoes for hiking so I ordered the men's 8.5 which is what I usually wear. My toes have just enough space without a lot of extra to trip me up.
They feel natural to walk in. I used low profile socks, plenty of toe room for my size 13 feet. Light weight too.
Very well designed and comfy to walk around. Will be repurchasing this for whenever I run this pair to the ground

This is the third pair I bought. They look good. Feel marvelous wide toe box. I have very wide feet and these are by far the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. Eliminated pain I had from other wide shoes The low profile sole gives enough comfort and protection. Great quality for the price.

评论概述: Comfortable, but not as roomy as represented
评论详情: These are comfortable shoes and great for good traction. Only drawback is that they were represented as extremely roomy in the toes, than I found them to be… I have to wear my very thinnest socks in order to feel comfortable.  Sometimes I wear them, barefoot, but then they quickly get dirty in our sandy environment. Can throw them in the washing machine.  But I would just prefer greater foot space so I could wear a normal sock with them.

These shoes are comfortable and seemed to be well built.  But, after wearing them for about a week that changed. There is a lose flap that is supposed to go over your toes but it falls down and bunches up in front of your toes making them extremely uncomfortable.  I try to get the flap to stay up and slide my toes underneath it when I put them on. Sometimes it works. But, I have found that doing different activities will cause the flap to work it's way back over the tips of my toes and bunch up. Too bad. I had high hopes.
I bought a size 12, my usual size. I couldn't get the shoe even halfway up my foot. Very disappointed.

These really work your calves after a jog! Tried wearing them barefoot but got a blister- they feel great with some socks- and I can totally feel them working out different muscle groups compared to jogging shoes.

When I wear these shoes I can honestly feel how unnatural my regular shoes are. They feel so natural and comfortable while walking. I feel connected with the ground but without the roughness of the terrain on my feet.
